context:
### Idiom: 低三下四
### Meaning: ①形容社会地位低下。②形容卑贱恭顺，阿谀逢迎。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 人生在世，既有风雨也有阳光，所以谁都需要别人的“支持”，但我们不要跪着，也不要低三下四，这才是一个完整的人生无怨无悔。
target: Life on earth has both wind and sunshine, so everyone needs others' "support". But we should not kneel nor humble ourselves. Only in this way can we have an intact and unregretful life.

context:
### Idiom: 夕惕若厉
### Meaning: 若如；厉危。朝夕戒惧，如临危境，不敢稍懈。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: ”以九二爻位得正，宜固守成规，不必改作，自得其利。九三，君子终日乾乾，夕惕若厉。足下其谨遵爻辞，行之可也。
target: “The Nine at the Middle Position is correct, and it is appropriate to keep the established rules in place and not to alter them. Then you will be able to reap the benefits. Nine Three: The gentleman is busy all day, and in the evening he is alert and severe. It is appropriate to be careful in following the instructions of this divination.

context:
### Idiom: 无相无作
### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 世尊往昔说法既久，我时在座，身体疲懈，但念空无相无作，于菩萨法，游戏神通，净佛国土，成就众生，心不喜乐。所以者何？世尊令我等出于三界，得涅槃证，又今我等，年已朽迈，于佛教化菩萨阿耨多罗三藐三菩提，不生一念好乐之心。
target: The World Honored One has spoken the Dharma for a long time, and I sat there, my body weary. But thinking of emptiness, formlessness, and non-action, in the Bodhisattva's teachings, I play with supernatural powers, purify the Buddha's land, and fulfill sentient beings, yet my heart is not joyful. Why is this so? The World Honored One has led us out of the three realms and attained Nirvana. Now we are old and decaying, in the Buddha's teachings of Bodhisattva Anuttara-samyak-sambodhi, we do not generate a single moment of joy.

context:
### Idiom: 苦尽甘来
### Meaning: 比喻生活经历中由苦到乐的转变。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 肖宇梁心碎散粉收留站#肖宇梁# #全世界最好的肖宇梁# 宝宝我们已经苦尽甘来了 在坚持一点点@肖宇梁Rainco。
target: Xiao Yulang is heartbroken and her fans are all over the place #Xiao Yulang# #Xiao Yulang is the best in the world# Baby, we have endured and overcome a lot. We will persist in the future. #Xiao Yulang Rainco

context:
### Idiom: 炙手可热
### Meaning: 接近之便烫手。比喻权势气焰之盛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 股票。新能源汽车炙手可热。期货。
target: Stocks. New energy vehicles are in high demand. Futures.

context:
### Idiom: 嫣然一笑
### Meaning: 形容娇媚的微笑。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: ’‘我们邻居呀。’她嫣然一笑，朝阿婆指指手：‘还是她家的好吃。
target: ''Our neighbor. ’ She smiled sweetly and pointed at her grandma: ‘Her food is still delicious.

context:
### Idiom: 老而不死
### Meaning: 本是孙子骂旧友原壤年老无德可称术的话，后亦指年老而不利于社会国家或拖累后辈。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 洛枫认为环顾香港及海外的华人地区，他的性别越界与艺术境界，无人能及，其短暂的、一瞬即逝的，成就至美。书末引用作家毛尖追忆哥哥如何影响你我：人活得太久，难免老而不死，歹戏拖棚，唯独张国荣能够从时间中获得赦免，超脱世俗的腐蚀，二十年后更显凄美。文章获授权转载，原文可见于此。
target: Luo Feng believes that when looking at Hong Kong and overseas Chinese regions, no one can match his gender transcendence and artistic boundaries. His brief and fleeting achievements are the most beautiful. The end of the book quotes the writer Mao Jian reminiscing about how his brother influenced us: People live too long, inevitably old and not dead, dragging out a bad show, only Leslie Cheung can get absolution from time, transcending the corrosion of the secular world, and becoming more poignant twenty years later. The article is authorized for reprinting, and the original text can be seen here.

context:
### Idiom: 天不作美
### Meaning: 天不成全美事。多指要进行的事情因刮风下雨而受到了影响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 陈楚寰告诉《联合早报》：“开拍前，勋评很有自信地说，在水中只要把我的下巴抬起来，我就不会喝到海水。当日老天不作美，不时下雨，我们赶着拍，没有太多时间彩排。拍摄时，我不知道勋评和鸣杰谁在左谁在右，只知道有一只手掐住我的脖子，我的呼吸不顺畅，一直咳嗽，喝到海水。
target: Chen Chue-yun told the Daily Mail: "Before the shoot, Sun-pi had a lot of confidence that if I raised my nose, I would not drink the water. On the shoot day, I did not know who was on my left and who on my right, but I knew a hand was holding my neck, my breathing was trouble, I constantly coughed and drank the water."

context:
### Idiom: 不卑不亢
### Meaning: 卑低、自卑；亢高傲。指对人有恰当的分寸，既不低声下气，也不傲慢自大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 在统一战线工作和对敌伪斗争中，牟宜之既能坚持政治立场，又善于团结各个阶层、各种地位的人士。有时虽置身危地亦义正词严侃侃而谈，不卑不亢毫无假借，同时能与各方各界保持过从与交谊。1946年5月，牟宜之奉调至东北辽东军区，先后任司令部秘书长和政治部联络部长。
target: In the united front work and anti-Japanese and puppet struggle, Mou Yizhi could not only stick to the political stance, but also be good at uniting people of various strata and positions. Sometimes, even in a dangerous situation, he talked seriously and seriously, not humble or arrogant, and had no pretensions. At the same time, he could maintain contacts and friendships with all parties and sectors. In May 1946, Mou Yizhi was transferred to the Liaodong Military Region of the Northeast, successively serving as Secretary-General of the Headquarters and Director of the Contact Department of the Political Department.

context:
### Idiom: 撒科打诨
### Meaning: 穿插在戏曲表演中，使观众发笑的动作与道白。亦泛指引人发笑的言语、动作。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 撒科打诨了20多年， 突然想要负起责任了。
target: After twenty years of gossiping, it suddenly felt like it was time to take responsibility.

context:
### Idiom: 早出晚归
### Meaning: 早晨出去，晚上归来。谓整日在外。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 他指平日儿子和媳妇都早出晚归，只有他们两老和两名孙女在家，他担心对方会变本加厉。不过他并没怪责男子父母，只希望警方能介入，避免再发生类似情况。
target: He mentioned that his son and daughter-in-law usually leave home early and return late every day, so only he and his wife, as well as their two granddaughters, are at home. He is worried that the other party will become more aggressive. However, he did not blame the man's parents, but only hoped that the police could intervene to prevent similar situations from happening again.

context:
### Idiom: 自命清高
### Meaning: 命认为。自以自为清高。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 爱心人士今天会遇到可爱的小动物，有强烈的领养念头，渴望从中找到乐趣；有晨跑习惯的单身者今天会邂逅心仪的异性，恋情就在那回眸一笑中产生；工作中的你显得太专注，因而忽视同事间的问候，小心会让人觉得你很自命清高！
target: Charity minded people will meet cute animals with a strong desire to adopt, looking for a fun opportunity; single early morning runners will meet their love interest, romance started with a glance; you would be too busy to notice your coworkers' questions, be careful not to appear self-confident!

context:
### Idiom: 困兽犹斗
### Meaning: 被围困的野兽仍然搏斗。比喻处于绝境仍作竭力挣扎。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 封敕文预先设置重兵在壕沟外拦击，战斗从夜里一直打到次日早晨。封敕文与众将士商议说：“困兽犹斗，何况是人。叛军知道他们没有生路，同我们拼死对抗，一定会伤害我们的将士，我们不容易平定他们。
target: Feng Luwen set up heavy troops to block outside the trench in advance, and the battle lasted from night to the next morning. Feng Chiwen discussed with the soldiers and said: "The trapped animals are still fighting, let alone humans. The rebels know that they have no way out, and if they fight to the death with us, they will definitely hurt our soldiers. It will not be easy for us to pacify them."

context:
### Idiom: 一拍即合
### Meaning: 原指一打拍子就合于乐曲的节奏。比喻一下子就能够互相吻合。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 创刊月余后，原为国闻社出资方之一的皖系军阀卢永祥在江浙战争中战败，遂令一社一刊的经费面临断绝。此时天津盐业银行总经理吴鼎昌南来，欲在上海开设四行储蓄会，需要一个发表言论的地方，而吴鼎昌与胡政之本是留日同学，双方一拍即合，由吴每月以广告费名义供给《国闻周报》400元，再加上其他经费来源，使刊物得以支撑发行。《国闻周报》1924年8月在上海创刊。
target: A month after its inauguration, Lu Yongxiang, one of the original investors of Guowen Society and a warlord of the Anhui clique, was defeated in the Jiangsu-Zhejiang War, which resulted in the funding for the society and its publication facing a cutoff. At this time, Wu Dingchang, the general manager of the Tianjin Salt Industry Bank, came from the south. He wanted to set up a Four-Line Savings Association in Shanghai and needed a place to express his opinions. Wu Dingchang and Hu Zhengzhi were classmates studying in Japan. The two parties immediately hit it off. Wu provided 400 yuan per month to the "Guowen Weekly" under the name of advertising fees. Together with other sources of funds, the publication was able to continue its issuance. "Guowen Weekly" was launched in Shanghai in August 1924.

context:
### Idiom: 赫赫之功
### Meaning: 赫赫盛大显著貌。显赫的业绩。形容功劳极大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 首先，在参加相亲会前做好心理建设（提振士气），其次，扬长避短地撰写个人简历（立于不败之地），索要联系方式时，要其疾如风，培养对方好感时，要其徐如林，展开追求时，要侵略如火，被对方玩弄时，要不同如山。孙子相亲学家说，每个女孩都该知道，‘善战者无赫赫之功’。原意是说，擅长作战的人，不会以辉煌的战功彪炳于世，反而是润物细无声地取得胜利。
target: First of all, do a good job of psychological construction before participating in the blind date meeting (to boost morale). Secondly, write your resume in a way that maximizes your strengths and avoid weaknesses (to be invincible). When asking for contact information, be as quick as the wind. When cultivating the other person's goodwill, be as fast as the wind. He is as gentle as Lin. When pursuing, he should be as aggressive as fire. When being played by the opponent, he should be as different as a mountain. Sun Tzu, a dating expert, said that every girl should know, "He who is good at fighting has no great achievements." The original meaning is that those who are good at fighting will not shine in the world with brilliant military exploits, but will win silently.

context:
### Idiom: 言之成理
### Meaning: 话讲得合乎道理。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: （如果欧元区不像现在那么四分五裂，本可能三强鼎立。）所以，所谓人民币可能对美元构成挑战的说法，乍看下似乎言之成理。然而，克鲁曼指出，美元拥有难以匹敌的三大优势。
target: (If the Eurozone weren't as fragmented as it is now, it could have been one of the top three powers.) Therefore, the claim that the Renminbi could potentially challenge the US dollar seems plausible at first glance. However, Krugman points out that the US dollar has three major advantages that are hard to match.

context:
### Idiom: 谨言慎行
### Meaning: 说话小心，行动谨慎。语本《礼记·缁衣》：“故言必虑其所终，而行必稽其所敝，则民谨於言而慎於行。”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 丫鬟有素云、碧月等。李氏与荣国府贾政一家联姻，不到二十岁的贾珠与李纨成婚，但因病早死，使李纨守寡，安分守节、谨言慎行，以致面容枯槁，唯知“侍亲育子，外则陪侍小姑针凿诵读而已”。
target: The maids include Suyun, Biyue and others. The Li family married Jia Zheng's family in Rongguo Mansion. Jia Zhu, who was less than 20 years old, married Li Wan. However, she died early due to illness, leaving Li Wan a widow. I raise my son by myself, and I just accompany my sister-in-law to read needles and chisels."

context:
### Idiom: 以言取人
### Meaning: 根据人的口才去判断其智能。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 口才是一个人的思想、智慧、知识、见识、性格、气质等综合素质的反映。人们常常免不了“以貌取人”，其实在生活和社会交往中多数时候是“以言取人”。成功大师戴而卡耐基曾说："一个人的成功，仅仅15%取决于技术知识，而其余的85%则取决于口才艺术”。
target: Eloquence is a reflection of a person's thoughts, wisdom, knowledge, insights, character, temperament, and other comprehensive qualities. People often inevitably "judge a book by its cover", but in fact, in life and social interactions, most of the time it is "judging a person by their words". Success master Dale Carnegie once said: "A person's success depends only 15% on technical knowledge, and the remaining 85% depends on the art of eloquence."

context:
### Idiom: 天保九如
### Meaning: 天保《诗经·小雅》中的篇名；九如该诗中连用了九个如”字，有棕福寿延绵不绝之意。旧时祝寿的话，棕福寿绵长。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 【天津空港板块】里一些热门项目的改善户型价值之天保九如品筑，129㎡ #天津##户型##改善##房地产##探盘#。
target: The value of a few popular projects in the Taichung Airport Area - Sun Park Nine - 129m2 #Taichung #improvement #property #data

context:
### Idiom: 如人饮水，冷暖自知
### Meaning: 泛指自己经历的事，自己知道甘苦。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 有一天，上师讲解龙树菩萨《中观论》时，他坐在那里听讲，整堂课中，书本翻都没有翻动一页。有的时候，某些事要亲身感受才会明白，「如人饮水，冷暖自知」，真的无法说清楚。』，世上还有这样的道理吗？佛菩萨应该讲清楚一点，是这个就是这个，不是这个就不是这个嘛！」他始终都不理解，因为这是在讲般若，讲的是空性。
target: One day, when the teacher was teaching the comparative doctrine of the Buddhist master, he sat there listening, the whole class, without even looking at a page of the text. Sometimes, things have to be experienced first, "as a man drinks water, the hot and cold are his own", it is really impossible to say clearly. """This is the truth, it is the truth, it is the truth!"" He never understood, because it was talking about the Buddhist doctrine of the empty nature.

### Idiom: 死生有命，富贵在天
### Meaning: 指万事皆由天命注定。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 司马光云：“死生有命，富贵在天。”
target: Sima Guangyun: "Death and life have destiny, wealth and honor are in heaven."

context:
### Idiom: 深谷为陵
### Meaning: 深谷变成山陵。常喻人世间的重大变迁。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 逃离了你的深谷为陵 逃不开这一世的牵绊。
target: I can't escape the bondage of this life if I escape your deep valley.

context:
### Idiom: 枉矢哨壶
### Meaning: 枉曲；矢箭；哨不正；壶古代投矢娱乐所用的器具。弯的箭，歪的壶。比喻不精致的器物，为主人自谦之辞。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 宾曰：“某赐旨酒嘉肴，又重以乐，敢固辞！”。主人曰：“枉矢哨壶，不足辞也，敢固以请！”。宾对曰：“某固辞不得命，敢不敬从？”。
target: Bing said, "I have been given imperial wine, delicious food, and music. How can I dare to refuse!" The host said, "The bow and arrow, the gourd, are not enough to refuse. I dare to insist on asking!" Bing replied, "I dare not refuse the order. How can I not respectfully comply?"

context:
### Idiom: 钟鼎之家
### Meaning: 富贵宦达之家。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 也展现出林家书香门第的底蕴。虽系钟鼎之家，却亦是书香之族。这林如海姓林名海，表字如海。
target: It also shows the profound cultural heritage of the Lin family, a family of scholars. Although it is a family of nobility, it is also a family of scholars. This Lin Ruohai, surname Lin, first name Ruohai, courtesy name Ruohai.

context:
### Idiom: 落拓不羁
### Meaning: 形容人性情豪放，行为散漫。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 旺仔这小子＝10%可爱+20%搞笑+ 30%聪明+10086%毁天灭地上蹿下跳落拓不羁顽皮赖骨。
target: This kid Wangzi = 10% cute + 20% funny + 30% smart + 10086% destructive, jumping up and down, uninhibited and naughty.

context:
### Idiom: 别籍异财
### Meaning: 指另立门户，各蓄家产。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 五代十国连年战乱、纲常礼仪沦丧。宋朝建立后，家庭成员“别籍异财”之风屡禁不止，“家产争讼呈现爆炸之态”。在此背景下，《宋刑统》承认在父亲死亡前入籍的别宅子有一定的继承权。
target: The Five Nations and Ten Kingdoms were a period of fighting and religious codes were destroyed. After the establishment of the Han dynasty, family members were prohibited from entering into their own marriage and "property disputes were a huge problem". In this context, the "Shang Jingwei" recognized a certain right to inheritance of a person who was registered before his father's death.

context:
### Idiom: 缺一不可
### Meaning: 少一样也不行。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 一个企业拥有一个高品质的宣传片也势在必行，那么对于企业来讲，对宣传片制作了解多少呢？做好一部企业宣传片有哪些注意的呢？下面，中国电影电视网就这一问题给大家做一个简单回答。总之，一部高质量的企业宣传片由前期策划、中期拍摄以及后期制作来完成的，每一个环节都很重要，缺一不可，相辅相成的，都要求完美无瑕，这样才能制作出优秀精良的企业宣传片。其次，一部优秀的企业宣传片要给观众视觉冲击。
target: It is also imperative for a company to have a high-quality promotional video. So, how much does a company know about making a promotional video? What do you need to pay attention to when making a corporate promotional video? Below, China Movie Television Network will give a simple answer to this question. In short, a high-quality corporate promotional video is completed through the initial planning, mid-term shooting, and post-production stages, and every link is important, indispensable, and mutually reinforcing, all requiring flawlessness, so that we can produce an excellent corporate promotional video. Secondly, an excellent corporate promotional video should give viewers a visual impact.

context:
### Idiom: 晓风残月
### Meaning: 拂晓风起，残月将落。常形容冷落凄凉的意境。也指歌妓的清唱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 与樊樊山、朱祖谋、况周颐称清季“四大词宗”。俞樾评文卓的词：“豪宕之中兼以细腻，合大江东去、晓风残月为一手”。又精于音律。
target: Together with Fan Fanshan, Zhu Zumou and Kuang Zhouyi, they were called the "four major Ci schools" in the Qing Dynasty. Yu Yue commented on Wenzhuo's words: "Delicacy is combined with the generosity, and the great river goes eastward, and the dawn wind and the waning moon are one hand." He is also good at music.

context:
### Idiom: 不速之客
### Meaning: 没有邀请而自己来的客人。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 根据报导，一名男子若是被黄金眼镜蛇咬到，可以在30分钟内没命。伊拉斯谟当时正从布隆泉飞向普利托利亚，除了不速之客的蛇外，机上还载了4名乘客。因为不想要引发紧张，还‘非常害怕这条蛇可能已经去了后面跟造成大规模恐慌’，伊拉斯谟仔细想了想，接著冷静地把飞机上有蛇的事情告诉乘客。
target: According to reports, if a man is bitten by a golden cobra, he can die within 30 minutes. Erasmus was flying from Bloem Springs to Pretoria, and in addition to the uninvited snake, there were four passengers on board. Not wanting to cause tension and 'very afraid that the snake might have gone behind and caused mass panic', Erasmus thought carefully before calmly telling the passengers about the snake on the plane.

context:
### Idiom: 琴瑟之好
### Meaning: 比喻夫妻间感情和谐。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: “那就对了，本王与王妃刚刚结成琴瑟之好，正是夫妻二人恩爱之时，可本王听说大婚第二日二夫人就给王妃安排通房，岂不是置本王于不义，有心破坏我夫妻和睦？”。
target: "That's right, my lord and the queen just began to make love, and they were both very in love, but when my lord heard the second wife arranged the bedroom for the queen the day after the wedding, isn't that taking my lord in the wrong, and having the intention of ruining my marriage?"
